SQL: SELECT CivilizationType as PageID, null as PageGroupID, "Gameplay" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM Civilizations where StartingCivilizationLevelType = "CIVILIZATION_LEVEL_FULL_CIV"

SELECT ProgressionTreeNodeType as PageID, "CIVICS" as PageGroupID, "Gameplay" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM ProgressionTreeNodes WHERE ProgressionTree in (SELECT ProgressionTreeType from ProgressionTrees where NOT EXISTS (Select 1 from Civilizations where UniqueCultureProgressionTree = ProgressionTreeType) and SystemType = "SYSTEM_CULTURE")

SELECT ProgressionTreeNodeType as PageID, ProgressionTree as PageGroupID, "Gameplay" as PageLayoutID, Name, 20 as SortIndex FROM ProgressionTreeNodes WHERE ProgressionTree in (SELECT UniqueCultureProgressionTree from Civilizations)
SELECT GovernmentType as PageID, null as PageGroupID, "Government" AS PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM Governments
SELECT Leaders.LeaderType AS PageID, null AS PageGroupID, "Gameplay" AS PageLayoutID, Leaders.Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM Leaders WHERE IsMajorLeader = true
SELECT ConstructibleType as PageID, "BUILDINGS" as PageGroupID, "Building" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM Constructibles WHERE ConstructibleClass = "BUILDING"
SELECT UniqueQuarterType as PageID, "UNIQUE_QUARTERS" as PageGroupID, "UniqueQuarter" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM UniqueQuarters

SELECT C.ConstructibleType as PageID, null as PageGroupID, "Improvement" as PageLayoutID, Name, 30 as SortIndex FROM Constructibles as C inner join Improvements as I on C.ConstructibleType = I.ConstructibleType WHERE ConstructibleClass = "IMPROVEMENT" AND I.DiscoveryType IS NULL
SELECT ConstructibleType as PageID, null as PageGroupID, "Wonder" as PageLayoutID, Name, 30 as SortIndex FROM Constructibles WHERE ConstructibleClass = "WONDER"
SELECT BeliefType AS PageID, "BELIEFS" AS PageGroupID, "Belief" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Beliefs
SELECT UnitType AS PageID, "CIVILIAN_UNITS" AS PageGroupID, "Unit" AS PageLayoutID, Name, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Units WHERE FormationClass="FORMATION_CLASS_CIVILIAN" AND TraitType IS NULL
SELECT UnitType AS PageID, "LAND_COMBAT_UNITS" AS PageGroupID, "Unit" AS PageLayoutID, Name, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Units WHERE FormationClass="FORMATION_CLASS_LAND_COMBAT" AND TraitType IS NULL
SELECT UnitType AS PageID, "NAVAL_COMBAT_UNITS" AS PageGroupID, "Unit" AS PageLayoutID, Name, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Units WHERE FormationClass="FORMATION_CLASS_NAVAL" AND TraitType IS NULL
SELECT UnitType AS PageID, "AIR_COMBAT_UNITS" AS PageGroupID, "Unit" AS PageLayoutID, Name, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Units WHERE FormationClass="FORMATION_CLASS_AIR" AND TraitType IS NULL
SELECT UnitType AS PageID, "COMMAND_UNITS" AS PageGroupID, "Unit" AS PageLayoutID, Name, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Units WHERE FormationClass="FORMATION_CLASS_COMMAND" AND TraitType IS NULL
SELECT UnitType AS PageID, "UNIQUE_CIVILIAN_UNITS" AS PageGroupID, "Unit" AS PageLayoutID, Name, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Units WHERE FormationClass="FORMATION_CLASS_CIVILIAN" AND TraitType IS NOT NULL
SELECT UnitType AS PageID, "UNIQUE_MILITARY_UNITS" AS PageGroupID, "Unit" AS PageLayoutID, Name, 10 AS SortIndex FROM Units WHERE FormationClass<>"FORMATION_CLASS_CIVILIAN" AND TraitType IS NOT NULL
SELECT BiomeType as PageID, "BIOMES" as PageGroupID, "Biome" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM Biomes
SELECT FeatureType as PageID, "NATURAL_WONDERS" as PageGroupID, "NaturalWonder" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM Features where Removable = 0

SELECT ResourceType as PageID, "RESOURCES" as PageGroupID, "Resource" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM Resources WHERE ResourceType IN (Select ResourceType from Resource_ValidAges where AgeType = ?1)

SELECT ProgressionTreeNodeType as PageID, null as PageGroupID, "Gameplay" as PageLayoutID, Name, 10 as SortIndex FROM ProgressionTreeNodes WHERE ProgressionTree in (SELECT  ProgressionTreeType from ProgressionTrees where SystemType = "SYSTEM_TECH")
